attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
clubs and pubs are closing at the rate of 40 per week.we will have no social life left. a working man has always enjoyed going out for a drink and a smoke.the promise of non-smokers filling the pubs and clubs has not happened.give us our social life back before it's too late.the goverment are now concerned because of the loss of revenue on dinks and tobacco.
  so .lift the smoking ban now.
